messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/6498074/diff/2001/go103
File go103 (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6498074/diff/2001/go103#newcode7
go103:7: Most recent CL I looked at: 38b71d522589
I looked at up to c2fb0e36f5e8, which includes 30 more CLs, but I have nearly 400 CLs in my list while you have less than 150. Where'd the missing changes go? I used the exact same line you did. hm.

Here's my list:
